comment: Registered for 1211L under a different professor and somehow ended up with latonya as my instructor. In pre-lab she often messes up and students realize her mistake or the professor that is rarely in there will catch it. Always seems pretty annoyed when you try to ask her questions and you often find yourself more confused after asking. Do not rec.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Professor Downer is not lenient at all. She will mark you wrong for anything she can, and does not give half credit. She also tends to work problems out wrong, or tell you the wrong answer in class, but still mark you wrong on your paper for her mistake. She has disliked me since day 1 because I often ask questions in class and annoy her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.
